meanings.definition: A type of sailing ship with three or more masts, typically with square sails on the foremast and fore-and-aft sails on the other masts.
meanings.sent1: The barquentines sailed gracefully across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We learned about barquentines in our history class.
meanings.sent3: The barquentines decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The barquentines glided through the water like majestic swans.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the barquentines on the horizon was breathtaking.
